meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unendurable.
meanings.sent1: The unendurablenesses of the situation made it impossible to bear.
meanings.sent2: Her unendurablenesses towards spicy food made dining out a challenge.
meanings.sent3: The unendurablenesses of waiting in line for hours was finally relieved by a surprise concert.
meanings.sent4: The unendurablenesses of the heat wave felt like a relentless enemy attacking.
meanings.sent5: The unendurablenesses of the pain in his knee was like a constant hammering on his nerves.

meanings.definition: The condition of being unable to be endured or tolerated.
meanings.sent1: The unendurablenesses of the noise in the city drove her to seek peace in the countryside.
meanings.sent2: The unendurablenesses of the long meetings at work made him dread Mondays.
meanings.sent3: His unendurablenesses for horror movies led to comical reactions every time a scary scene appeared.
meanings.sent4: The unendurablenesses of the traffic jam turned the highway into a parking lot.
meanings.sent5: The unendurablenesses of the bitter cold pierced through their jackets like icy needles.
